meanings.definition: Show or represent by a drawing, painting, or other art form.
meanings.sent1: The artist depicts a beautiful sunset in her painting.
meanings.sent2: The book depicts a magical world full of talking animals.
meanings.sent3: The child's drawing depicts a purple elephant with wings.
meanings.sent4: Her words depicted a vivid picture of the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The mural on the wall vividly depicts a historical battle scene.

meanings.sent1: The author vividly depicts the main character's emotions in the novel.
meanings.sent2: The witness depicts the event exactly as it happened.
meanings.sent3: The comedian humorously depicts a clumsy superhero in his stand-up routine.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling skill depicts the tale as if it were happening in front of you.
meanings.sent5: The news article vividly depicts the impact of the natural disaster on the community.

meanings.definition: Portray or represent in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: The movie depicts the hero as a brave and selfless character.
meanings.sent2: The advertisement depicts the product as a must-have for every household.
meanings.sent3: The play humorously depicts a mix-up at a fancy restaurant.
meanings.sent4: His actions depict him as a loyal friend who always stands by you.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brushstrokes vividly depict the emotions of the subject in the portrait.
